verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and to Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto them When any אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> has זָ֣ב <S%H2100><s%> hath a running issue מִבְּשָׂר֔וֹ <S%H1320><s%> out of his flesh זוֹב֖וֹ <S%H2101><s%> [because of] his issue טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> he [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְזֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become טֻמְאָת֖וֹ <S%H2932><s%> And this shall be his uncleanness בְּזוֹב֑וֹ <S%H2101><s%> in his issue רָ֣ר <S%H7325><s%> run בְּשָׂר֞וֹ <S%H1320><s%> whether his flesh אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for זוֹב֗וֹ <S%H2101><s%> with his issue אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or הֶחְתִּ֤ים <S%H2856><s%> be stopped בְּשָׂרוֹ֙ <S%H1320><s%> or his flesh מִזּוֹב֔וֹ <S%H2101><s%> from his issue טֻמְאָת֖וֹ <S%H2932><s%> it [is] his uncleanness הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ב <S%H4904><s%> Every bed אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> whereon he lieth עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> with הַזָּ֖ב <S%H2100><s%> that hath the issue יִטְמָ֑א <S%H2930><s%> is unclean וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every הַכְּלִ֛י <S%H3627><s%> and every thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> whereon he sitteth עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and יִטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean

וְאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And whosoever אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִגַּ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> toucheth בְּמִשְׁכָּב֑וֹ <S%H4904><s%> his bed יְכַבֵּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְהַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> And he that sitteth עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַכְּלִ֔י <S%H3627><s%> on [any] thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> whereon he sat עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> with הַזָּ֑ב <S%H2100><s%> that hath the issue יְכַבֵּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְהַנֹּגֵ֖עַ <S%H5060><s%> And he that toucheth בִּבְשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh הַזָּ֑ב <S%H2100><s%> of him that hath the issue יְכַבֵּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יָרֹ֛ק <S%H7556><s%> spit הַזָּ֖ב <S%H2100><s%> And if he that hath the issue בַּטָּה֑וֹר <S%H2889><s%> upon him that is clean וְכִבֶּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> then he shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every הַמֶּרְכָּ֗ב <S%H4817><s%> And what saddle אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִרְכַּ֥ב <S%H7392><s%> soever he rideth עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> with הַזָּ֖ב <S%H2100><s%> upon that hath the issue יִטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Whoever הַנֹּגֵ֗עַ <S%H5060><s%> And whosoever toucheth בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> any אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become תַחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> were under יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> any thing that was under him shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until the even וְהַנּוֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and he that beareth אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> יְכַבֵּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> [any of] those things shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after יִגַּע־ <S%H5060><s%> And whomsoever he toucheth בּוֹ֙ הַזָּ֔ב <S%H2100><s%> that hath the issue וְיָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without שָׁטַ֣ף <S%H7857><s%> and hath not rinsed בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְכִבֶּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> he shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וּכְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> And the vessel חֶ֛רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> of earth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִגַּע־ <S%H5060><s%> that he toucheth בּ֥וֹ הַזָּ֖ב <S%H2100><s%> which hath the issue יִשָּׁבֵ֑ר <S%H7665><s%> shall be broken וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every כְּלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> and every vessel עֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> of wood יִשָּׁטֵ֖ף <S%H7857><s%> shall be rinsed בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> in water

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now when יִטְהַ֤ר <S%H2891><s%> is cleansed הַזָּב֙ <S%H2100><s%> And when he that hath an issue מִזּוֹב֔וֹ <S%H2101><s%> of his issue וְסָ֨פַר <S%H5608><s%> then he shall number ל֜וֹ שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> to himself seven יָמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> days לְטָהֳרָת֖וֹ <S%H2893><s%> for his cleansing וְכִבֶּ֣ס <S%H3526><s%> and wash בְּגָדָ֑יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֧ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בְּשָׂר֛וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בְּמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> in running וְטָהֵֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> and shall be clean

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֗י <S%H8066><s%> And on the eighth יִֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> he shall take לוֹ֙ שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> to him two תֹרִ֔ים <S%H8449><s%> turtledoves א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> or two בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> young יוֹנָ֑ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeons וּבָ֣א ׀ <S%H935><s%> and come לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֙תַח֙ <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וּנְתָנָ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and give אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> them unto the priest

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> shall offer אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> them the one חַטָּ֔את <S%H2403><s%> [for] a sin offering וְהָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and the other עֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> [for] a burnt offering וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for him before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִזּוֹבֽוֹ׃ <S%H2101><s%> for his issue ס

וְאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if any man's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now if תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> go out מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> of copulation זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> from him then he shall wash בַּמַּ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> all his flesh וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any בֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> And every garment וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any ע֔וֹר <S%H5785><s%> and every skin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> of copulation זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> whereon is the seed וְכֻבַּ֥ס <S%H3526><s%> shall be washed בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> with water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even פ

וְאִשָּׁ֕ה <S%H802><s%> The woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> shall lie אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> also with whom man אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H854><s%> for שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> of copulation זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> [with] seed וְרָחֲצ֣וּ <S%H7364><s%> they shall [both] bathe בַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> [themselves] in water וְטָמְא֖וּ <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> And if a woman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has זָבָ֔ה <S%H2101><s%> [and] her issue דָּ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> be blood יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall continue זֹבָ֖הּ <S%H2100><s%> have an issue בִּבְשָׂרָ֑הּ <S%H1320><s%> in her flesh שִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall continue בְנִדָּתָ֔הּ <S%H5079><s%> she shall be put apart וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> and whosoever toucheth בָּ֖הּ יִטְמָ֥א <S%H2930><s%> her shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> Everything אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> And every thing that she lieth עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and בְּנִדָּתָ֖הּ <S%H5079><s%> upon in her separation יִטְמָ֑א <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean וְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> and everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תֵּשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> every thing also that she sitteth עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and יִטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> upon shall be unclean

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Anyone הַנֹּגֵ֖עַ <S%H5060><s%> And whosoever toucheth בְּמִשְׁכָּבָ֑הּ <S%H4904><s%> her bed יְכַבֵּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Whoever הַנֹּגֵ֔עַ <S%H5060><s%> And whosoever toucheth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כְּלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> any thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תֵּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that she sat עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and יְכַבֵּ֧ס <S%H3526><s%> upon shall wash בְּגָדָ֛יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe בַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <S%H2930><s%> and be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְאִ֨ם <S%H518><s%> Whether עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> it be on הַמִּשְׁכָּ֜ב <S%H4904><s%> And if it [be] on [her] bed ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he א֧וֹ <S%H176><s%> or עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַכְּלִ֛י <S%H3627><s%> or on any thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הִ֥וא <S%H1931><s%> she יֹשֶֽׁבֶת־ <S%H3427><s%> whereon she sitteth עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and בְּנָגְעוֹ־ <S%H5060><s%> when he toucheth ב֑וֹ יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> it he shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the even

וְאִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> If שָׁכֹב֩ <S%H7901><s%> lie יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> with her at all אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if any man אֹתָ֗הּ <S%H854><s%> for וּתְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become נִדָּתָהּ֙ <S%H5079><s%> and her flowers עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְטָמֵ֖א <S%H2930><s%> be upon him he shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ב <S%H4904><s%> and all the bed אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> whereon he lieth עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and יִטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> shall be unclean פ
